Thank you, thank you... I guess I should introduce myself!

I'm a level 10 Gnome Wizard on Fennin Ro, and have been playing for a few
months, after a good friend of mine pestered me for awhile to try out
everquest... and once I got a powerful enough computer, I got addicted!
Utterly!

I've played a couple other characters, and I really must admit that I work
best and enjoy my Wizard character the most.

Hope to be able to serve the list well!

_________________________
Eubeleus
